enhanced_by.reason: The method clearChangedCache() must be invoked before setMaxLength() to ensure that the cache is cleared and the new maxLength value is correctly reflected.
The method isChanged() can be used to verify if the changes made by setMaxLength() have been correctly applied and reflected in the overall schema changes.
The method getChangedElements() can be used to verify if the maxLength change is included in the list of changed elements after invoking setMaxLength().
